description: This file defines the NotesList React component, which displays a list of notes with options to edit or delete each note. It handles loading and empty states and formats note update timestamps.

methods.name: NotesList({ notes, onEdit, onDelete, loading })
methods.description: React functional component that renders a list of notes, with edit and delete actions, handling loading and empty states.

ctags.pattern: /^export default function NotesList({ notes, onEdit, onDelete, loading }) {$/
